name: Funding Options
overview:
Based in London, Funding Options uses modern web technology and emerging data sources to make it easier for small firms to access finance products and providers.

Small business lending is notable for the scale of challenges facing existing participants: UK examples include information challenges (60% of small firms have out-of-date accounts) and channel challenges (80% of term loans are by the main bank).

Funding Options sees opportunities to improve small business lending processes, driven by the adoption of cloud accounting software by SMEs, the emergence of financial services “APIs”, as well as government “open data” initiatives.

Funding Options was a winner of the UK government’s 2011 “Tech City Launchpad” competition to identify promising new firms in the East London technology cluster, and in 2012 was a global finalist in SWIFT’s annual “Innotribe Challenge”, as well as a “Finance 2.0” selected company” in the European TechTour.
